DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare fix combination ( BID ) [ Brinzolamide 10 mg/mL / Brimonidine 2 mg/mL eye drop , suspension ] unfixed combination ( BID ) [ Brinzolamide 10 mg/mL eye drop , suspension plus Brimonidine 2 mg/mL eye drop , solution ] respect intraocular pressure ( IOP ) -lowering efficacy .
